response.overview: The season review of the White Hart Lane club's dramatic 2008/09 season. After a disastrous start to the campaign and the sacking of Juande Ramos, the North London side had a strong revival with Harry Redknapp brought into the club. A Carling Cup Final, UEFA cup campaign and league season to contend with were just some of the events that Spur's fans had to endure and enjoy.
response.title: Tottenham Hotspur 2008/2009 Season Review
